title: Legal Counsel
description: Provide legal advice and draft contracts to support corporate activities.

title: Compliance Officer
description: Ensure company policies and procedures comply with regulations and standards.

title: Contract Manager
description: Negotiate, review, and manage all contractual agreements.

title: Paralegal
description: Support lawyers by conducting research and preparing legal documents.

title: Corporate Lawyer
description: Advise on mergers, acquisitions, and corporate governance matters.

title: Regulatory Affairs Specialist
description: Monitor and interpret regulatory changes affecting the business.
